item.title: Continuous glucose monitors (CGM) and beyond: A dialogue
item.description:
What are continuous glucose monitors good for? More broadly, what are continuous measures of physiology (CxM) good for?

Similar to Elliot and I’s dialogue, this post has an unconventional format. It’s both a synthesis of Willy’s, Eryney’s, and my opinions on continuous monitoring combined with a debate in places where we disagree. To try and make it clear which views are coming from each person, we’ve annotated sections that come from a subset of us rather than all of us with e.g. “Stephen’s views” or “Willy’s dissent”.
